title: Improve Polly system prompt and add auto-deploy
author: Itachi-1824

gist.headline: Polly gets to the point
gist.blurb: Our favorite helper Polly has been studying up on brevity. She's now more concise, just as helpful, and deploys herself automatically.
gist.summary: Refined Polly's system prompt for clearer, more concise responses and established an auto-deployment pipeline for the app.
gist.impact: Interactions with Polly are now more direct and helpful, with faster updates thanks to the new deployment workflow.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations Bee mascot tuning a cute pixel-art robotic parrot (Polly). The parrot is holding a small scroll (script). The scene represents 'tuning' the bot.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby 8-bit bee mascot adjusting a small antenna on a cute pixelated robot parrot. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text bubbles. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
